snippet: Giants cornerback Terrell Thomas is attempting to come back from the third tear of the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee and the second in two years.
abstract: New York Giants cornerback Terrell Thomas is attempting to come back from the third tear of the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee, his second in two years; most troubling thought is that Thomas might be nearing the premature end of a career that once held great promise.
lead_paragraph: Giants cornerback Terrell Thomas is attempting to come back from the third tear of the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee and the second in two years.

headline.main: Giants Cornerback Focused on Recovery, but Also the Future
headline.print_headline: Focused on Recovery, but Also the Future
